bis_01.LongName: BIS Q01: I plan tasks carefully.
bis_01.Description: People differ in the ways they act and think in different situations. This is a test to measure some of the ways in which you act and think. Read each statement and select the appropriate response. Do not spend too much time on any statement. Answer quickly and honestly

bis_fof_attention.Description: BIS - First Order Factor: Attention = sum(Q5,Q9*,Q11,Q20*,Q28)

bis_fof_coginstability.LongName: BIS - First Order Factor: Cognitive Instability
bis_fof_coginstability.Description: BIS - First Order Factor: Cognitive Instability = sum(Q6,Q24,Q26)

bis_fof_motor.Description: BIS - First Order Factor: Motor = sum(Q2,Q3,Q4,Q17,Q19,Q22,Q25)

bis_fof_perseverance.Description: BIS - First Order Factor: Perseverance = sum(Q16,Q21,Q23,Q30*)

bis_fof_selfcontrol.Description: BIS - First Order Factor: Self-Control = sum(Q1*,Q7*,Q8*,Q12*,Q13*,Q14)

bis_fof_cogcomplexity.LongName: BIS - First Order Factor: Cognitive Complexity
bis_fof_cogcomplexity.Description: BIS - First Order Factor: Cognitive Complexity = sum(Q1*,Q7*,Q8*,Q12*,Q13*,Q14)

bis_sof_attentional.Description: BIS - Second Order Factor: Attentional = bis_fof_attention + bis_fof_coginstability

bis_sof_motor.Description: BIS - Second Order Factor: Motor = bis_fof_motor + bis_fof_perseverance

bis_sof_nonplanning.Description: BIS - Second Order Factor: Non-Planning = bis_fof_selfcontrol + bis_fof_cogcomplexity
